title: Frontend Schism: Will React Server Components Destroy React?
author: Richard MacManus
description: React Server Components are controversial in the React ecosystem. An Angular co-creator and other frontend experts discuss the pros and cons.
cntitle: 前端分裂：React 服务器组件会摧毁 React 吗？
cndescription: React 服务器组件在 React 生态系统中存在争议。一位 Angular 联合创始人和其他前端专家讨论了其优缺点。
